titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning the Messias, in three chapters the first concerning the preparatories to his appearance in the types and prophesies of the Old Testament : the second demonstrating that it was typically and prophetically necessary that he should be born of a virgin : the third, that he is God as well as man : to which is prefixed a large preface ... : and an appendix is subjoyned concerning the divine extension ... / by John Turner ...
titleStmt.author: Turner, John, b. 1649 or 50.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.B. for Randolph Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
